notes.value: Galleries closed for construction/expansion until Fall 2026; building open only during education and auditorium/courtyard program hours; no general open hours until expansion complete.

raw_response.summary_short: City museum in Longmont; galleries closed for expansion until Fall 2026, but education and auditorium/courtyard programs continue.
raw_response.summary_long: Longmont Museum (Longmont, Colorado) is undergoing a gallery expansion: exhibits are closed for construction until Fall 2026. The building remains accessible only during scheduled education programs and auditorium/courtyard program hours, with no general open hours until the expansion is complete. Plan a visit around programs rather than exhibitions during this period.
visitor_tips: Do not plan on gallery viewing: exhibits are closed until Fall 2026 due to construction/expansion.
Visit only during scheduled education programs or auditorium/courtyard program hours (no general open hours).
Check the current program catalog for events and classes before traveling.
